sentences.sContent: She had no wish to share her father with any outsider and regarded us as interlopers.
sentences.sCn: 她不想与任何外人分享她的父亲并把我们视为闯入者。

remMethod.val: 来自interlope(v. 闯入； 干涉)

words.tran: 闯入；干涉；[法] 侵占他人权益

trans.tranCn: 闯入者；（为私利）干涉他人事务者；无执照营业者
trans.tranOther: someone who enters a place or group where they should not be
